PrecisRegulations Amending the INCOME TAX REGULATIONS (PREFERRED BENEFICIARY ELECTIONS) by extending the deadline for filing documents related to the election of a preferred beneficiary so that it coincides with the deadline for filing a capital gains election under subsection 110.6(19).
